title: Christian Knudsen
text:
Personal life
I live in Rødovre, Denmark, with my husband Kristian who works in IT. Born and raised in the cheap part northern Zealand, I moved to Nærum just north of Copenhagen as soon as I got tired of commuting to DTU. It took me an inordinate amount of time to graduate - mainly due to my intense involvement in the local student organisation. After graduating, the plans for a ph.d. was thwarted by cutbacks on environmental research and I ended up at DNLB as a subject specialist for chemistry.
